title: Cute and Cozy renovated 1BD w/Washer/Dryer + Everything you need!
posting_body: Photos are of a similar home.
Every home is unique so minor differences may occur.
This 2nd floor 1 Bedroom home features an stylish and remodeled Kitchen with Breakfast Bar, and Full Appliance package including Microwave, Dishwasher and Disposal!
Your restful bedroom awaits with ample closet space and lush carpet for your toes.
-Full Kitchen and Bath with Spa Style Features and Ample Storage
-Rich Wood-Inspired Plank Flooring and Lush Bedroom Carpet
We are now taking appointments for self-guided & guided tours of our available homes.
or email us park212 @ epicasset .com today to set up your visit with one of our leasing professionals!
Copy and paste for HD 3D walkthrough:
We invite you to apply for your new home at
Our community has the perfect Lynnwood location to satisfy your every need.
A multitude of activities surround your new apartment home.
Enjoy parks, restaurants, shopping plus all the amenities Park 212 Apartments has to offer.
We are located close enough to Highway 99 for easy commutes and Public Transit but tucked back enough to enjoy a park-like feel.
Need to get to a grocery store?
Well, no worries, cause it’s just about a mile away-Trader Joe’s, Sprouts, Winco and More!
Plenty of restaurants, craft breweries, and other fun too.
It's less than a 5 min drive (or don't fight for parking-it's only a few blocks away)
We have hardworking and friendly staff on-site 7 days a week and are here to answer any questions that you ever have!
Come check us out here, so we can show you why Park 212 Apartments is your new home!
Our office is staffed to answer your questions:
$250 Holding deposit (Refundable Security Deposit equal to 1 month's rent may be required)
Best Price is with 12 month lease.
Sorry, no ferrets or large aquariums (>15 Gallons).
Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Garbage disposal, Range/Oven, Microwave
Outdoor pool, Picnic Area, Charcoal Barbecue grills, Basketball Court, Pet Park
Controlled Access buildings, Courtesy Patrol 7 days a week
1.5 Miles from Kaiser Permanente Lynnwood Medical Center
.3 Miles from Swedish Edmonds Medical Center
3.5 Miles from Edmonds Marina and Ferry Terminal
Proudly and Professionally Managed by Seattle's own Epic Asset Management
Prices and special offers valid for new residents only.
Pricing and availability subject to change at any time.
